ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", $User.ProfileId <> "00ea0000001sYR8", $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, OR( Website = "none.com", Website = "test.com", Website = "www.com", Website = "www.-", Website = "www.abcd.com", Website = "www.n/a", Website = "www.na.com", Website = "www.no.com", Website = "www.qq.com", Website = "www.test.com", Website = "www.testamerica.com", Website = "www.testamericainc.com", Website = "www.web.de", Website = "www.x.com", Website = "www.xyz.com", Website = "www", Website = "www.na", Website = "不明", Website = "なし", Website = "nocompanywebsite.com", Website = "http://none"
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Website must be a valid website address.
